Text:
Assuming you want records that overlap the range:

    SELECT *
      FROM orders
     WHERE start_date <= :end_range
       AND end_date   >= :start_range

Assuming you want records that overlap the range:

    SELECT *
      FROM orders
     WHERE start_date <= :end_range
       AND end_date   >= :start_range

In your case:

    SELECT *
      FROM orders
     WHERE start_date <= '2016-04-30'
       AND end_date   >= '2016-04-01'

Assuming you want records that overlap the range:

    SELECT *
      FROM orders
     WHERE start_date <= :end_range
       AND end_date   >= :start_range

In your case:

    SELECT *
      FROM orders
     WHERE start_date <= '2016-04-30'
       AND end_date   >= '2016-04-01'


This works as below:

               <---RANGE-->
         <-->                                     X end_date   < :start_range
    R      <---->                                 Returned
    O             <---->                          Returned
    W         <--------------->                   Returned
    S                   <---->                    Returned
                                <-->              X start_date > :end_range
